department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: This contract is for the purchase of subscription services for the department of natural resources canada. the services will be used for the acquisition of publications of all types and in all media. there are three contract periods. the proposed start date is february 2024 and the proposed contract period is one year followed by two one-year option periods.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Subscription Agent Services
#### Reference Number WS4414800020
#### Solicitation Number WS4414800020

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Matthew Curran (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

The following Amendment has been made to this tender:
The closing time for submissions has been amended to [20 February 2024 at 14:00 EST]. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)** - Supply Arrangement E60PI-23AGNT-B
[
A link to the Ariba Discovery posting is available on our website.
](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18738004?extsite=MTg3MzgwMDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Natural Resources Canada requires a Subscription Agent to perform the following services:
- Acquisition of subscriptions to publications of all types and in all media
- Delivery, management, and related support of subscriptions
- Access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform

**Contract Requirements**
* Anticipated Start Date: February 2024
* Proposed Contract Period: One year from contract award date, with two additional one-year option periods.

**Eligible Suppliers**
* EBSCO Canada LTD has been invited to submit a proposal.

This tender announcement contains the following Important Updates:
* The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) is applicable.
* The procurement category is Government of Department (GD).
* A trade agreement is applicable. 

This tender announcement will be closed on [22 February 2024 at 14:00 EST] (original announcement). It is the responsibility of the respondent to regularly check our website for updates or to print out or download any information including solicitation documents, amendments or extensions thereto.  (Note: this announcement was originally suppose to end on this date, with the edit from closing above, revising this.


*tender* sections corresponding to English and french (make reference to website languages) ---
**_Tender Documents_** is available on our Government website and will remain active until [22 February 2024 at 14:00 EST].
